scripts.lint: npm run lint:root && npm run lint:electron-app && npm run lint:docusaurus
scripts.lint:root: cd electron-app && npm exec eslint -- --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache-root --fix .. --ignore-pattern "electron-app/**" --ignore-pattern "docusaurus/**"
scripts.lint:root:check: cd electron-app && npm exec eslint -- --cache --cache-strategy content --cache-location .cache/.eslintcache-root .. --ignore-pattern "electron-app/**" --ignore-pattern "docusaurus/**"
